title: GENERAL
fullText: The verification of a battery system shall be carried out in accordance with the requirements of AS/NZS 3000 for verification prior to energizing and placing the installation into service. The requirements of this Clause 6.4.2 represent minimum standards of inspection and testing to meet the minimum safety requirements for the installation. Upon completion of the verification process a report shall be provided for inclusion in the system documentation (see Clause 6.4.1).
